ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:8643, CONF:10377 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21.1"
SHALL conform to Advance Directives Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15343)/@code="42348-3" Advance directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15344)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:8647, CONF:8801)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
SHALL conform to Advance Directives Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.21)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15343)/@code="42348-3" Advance directives (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15344)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain [0..*] entry (CONF:7957, CONF:8800)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..*] entry (CONF:8647, CONF:8801)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Advance Directive Observation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.48)
